page.title: 05Education in Wootton Bassett
page.content:
Approximately 2350 children attend the five schools in Wootton Bassett. {The County Infants School.} Head:Mrs.J.M.Read Age Range:5-7 Number on roll:155 Status:County {St.Bartholomew's School.} Head:Mr.W.G.Tuckett Age Range:5-11 Number on roll:294 Status:C of E. {Noremarsh Junior School.} Head:Mr.J.M.Wray Age Range:8-11 Number on roll:207 Status:County {Longleaze School.} Head:Mr.A.R.Batterham Age Range:5-11 Number on roll:242 Status:County {Wootton Bassett School.} Head:Mr.D.C.Shepherd Age Range:11-18 Number on roll:1447 Status: County A Comprehensive School serving Wootton Bassett,Lyneham,Broad Town, Lydiard Millicent & surroundings.
Numbers on roll are Jan.1985 estimates
